Title: Halter topped prom gown

----

Sku: CK32

----

Price:

Saleprice:

Bulkdiscount: 0

Sizes: 8, 4, 12, 10, 6

Colors: coral

Category: formal-gowns

Featured-image: CK32-coral-halter-topped-prom-gown_p.jpg

----

Description: A perfect prom gown with a halter top and a mock two-piece look. Delicate beads and jewels detail the halter bodice, the straps around the sheer midriff, and the racer-back. Triangle cutout back and the full satin skirt completed the style with elegance.
